title: Identifying Concentrations and Outliers
body: The data here represents distances (in kilometers) from a home to local supermarkets. The stems are the ones places and the leaves are the tenths places. For instance, the data point with stem $$1$$ and leaf $$1$$ represents $$1.1$$ kilometer.\n##figure1.gif
lesson: 2.2 Stem-and-Leaf Graphs (Stemplots), Line Graphs, and Bar Graphs
